articles.title: Israel says ‘date set’ for Rafah invasion amid ongoing Gaza ceasefire talks - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Hamas says Israel is not acceding to demands of a military withdrawal and allowing Palestinians to return home.
articles.content:
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says a date has been set to invade Rafah in southern Gaza as truce talks with Hamas in Cairo are ongoing but do not appear close to the finish line.
